III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS & CONCLUSIONS
A. Physical Description of Facility
Good Will Farms Association is licensed as a Child Caring Institution, which is
contiguous to the campus of Michigan Technological University (CI310201151) in
Houghton. The main building is a three story brick, which sits one block up a hill from
U.S. 41. The Child Placing Agency will be using the same offices and buildings as the
Child Caring Institution. Good Will Farms Association has a history dating back to the
1800’s.
B. Program Description
Good Will Farms Placement Services will be licensed for certifying foster homes for
licensure, placing children in licensed foster homes, supervising 16 and 17 year olds on
Independent Living, evaluating applicants for adoption, and placing children for
adoption. Good Will Farms Association was previously licensed as a Child Placing
Agency (CB310201152). That license closed on 07/01/1995.
C. Rule/Statutory Violations
